description: '''Alt√©''' (locally pronounced as "ahl-teh") is a [[Hybrid genre|fusion genre]] of music that combines elements of [[afrobeats]], [[dancehall]], [[reggae]], [[Hip hop music|hip hop]], and [[alternative R&B]]. The term was coined in the 2010s by Nigerian music group [[DRB LasGidi]], meaning alternative and "individualistic and non-traditional modes of self-expression" through music and fashion.
